page.title: 10ARTS AND CRAFTS,ETTRICK.
page.content: This small area has surprisingly many arts and crafts. While dressmaking, knitting and crochet work are womanly pursuits , stickmaking,painting and pottery are undertaken by both men and women. There is a small market garden dealing mainly in dried flowers for the open market and for the art of flower craft. A small pottery nearby has a good trade with the tourist industry and with local shops. Two local artists paint in all mediums and also sell in and out of the area. Arts and crafts are geatly encouraged by the Women's Rural Institute, who encourage by holding regular classes and competitions, and many old crafts are handed down from generation to generation.
